name: Santa Bird Storm: Christmas Season
description:
Storm Chicken Egg Hunt: Christmas Season is challenging and very addictive game with unique gameplay.
Fly with the little wings of the bird to guide them to run through all kinds of obstacles in the wind and get as far as possible and collect their golden eggs. You need to avoid the flying objects.
Don't touch the objects try to avoid them carefully. Fly with him as far as possible in stormy and rainy skies.
Find all eggs and upgade collectibles with your flying bird in this new exciting casual game. Tap the screen to flap the wings and glide through all season events.

Game Features:
- 4 Unlockable season event sets (snow falling Christmas, raining Valentine's Day, Easter and spooky Halloween)
- Simple one touch control
- Stunning, detailed funny graphics
- Collectable golden bird egg, gold coins, stacks and different type of power-ups
- Upgradable birds and power ups in online shop
- Lot of different skins
